name: cborg
description: Fast CBOR with a focus on strictness

scripts.build: npx ipjs@latest build --tests && cp cli.js dist/
scripts.test:cjs: npm run build && mocha dist/cjs/node-test/test-*.js dist/cjs/node-test/node-test-*.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:node && npm run test:cjs && npm run test:browser
scripts.coverage: c8 --reporter=html mocha test/test-*.js && npx st -d coverage -p 8080

author: Rod <rod@vagg.org> (http://r.va.gg/)
